name: Assetto Corsa
shortDescription: Create a bridge to stream the game's telemetry to Quix
longDescription: Create a bridge to stream the local game's telemetry to Quix. Note that this bridge must be run locally on the same network as the game.

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: This is the output topic where the game telemetry data will be written

Variables.Name: HostName
Variables.Description: This is the Assetto Corsa server host

Variables.Name: Port
Variables.Description: This is the Assetto Corsa server port
